articles.title: Bill Belichick says in new book that Tom Brady made ‘right decision’ to leave Patriots in 2020
articles.description:
"We could not put a good team around him."

The post Bill Belichick says in new book that Tom Brady made ‘right decision’ to leave Patriots in 2020 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick acknowledges Tom Brady's departure from the Patriots was justified in his new book.
Belichick stated, 'We could not put a good team around him' regarding the 2020 season.
Brady's exit has significant implications for local fans and the team's future performance.

articles.title: West Boylston town administrator fired after Trump flag dispute sues town
articles.description:
"Ryan’s subsequent termination by the Select Board was purposeful retaliation for refusing to simply go along with the dictates of Chief Minnich.”

The post West Boylston town administrator fired after Trump flag dispute sues town appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: West Boylston town administrator Ryan was fired following a dispute over a Trump flag.
Ryan claims his termination was retaliation from the Select Board and Chief Minnich.
The lawsuit may affect local governance and political expression in West Boylston.
